title: Google Photos
description: Google Photos (note: only downloads photos uploaded by rclone due to Google policy)

read_only.title: Read Only
read_only.description: Set to make the Google Photos backend read only. If chosen, rclone will only request read only access to your photos

read_size.title: Read Size
read_size.description: Set to read the size of media items. Normally rclone does not read sizes (takes another transaction). Recommended for rclone mount

start_year.title: Start Year
start_year.description: Year limits the photos to be downloaded to those which are uploaded after the given year

include_archived.title: Include Archived
include_archived.description: Also view and download archived media. By default, archived media is not visible unless this flag is set

proxy.title: Proxy
proxy.description: Use the gphotosdl proxy for downloading full resolution images. E.g. 'http://localhost:8282'

$comment: Google Photos uses OAuth authentication. Important: Due to Google policy changes, rclone can now only download photos it uploaded
